Generated Narrative: ValueSet OncologyPatientCodes

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icpc2
    CodeDisplay
    R84
    R85
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10
    CodeDisplay
    C00Malignant neoplasm of lip
    C01Malignant neoplasm of base of tongue
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    363505006Malignant tumor of oral cavity
    363429002Malignant tumour of larynx
    363353009Malignant tumor of gallbladder
